channel.title: A question on source and clients
channel.description: now the source is how the game works and the client well compiles the source and lets the user play the game i think thats how it works but can i use testscape source with moparscape 3.2 client? my question is can i use any source with any client, how would the client know to take the codes from the specific source example testscape .

item.source: A question on source and clients

item.title: A question on source and clients
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

If all you have is .class files and no java files go download a decompiler and use it to open up the class file and you can see everything in there.I my self have a decompiler and it works great =]

On the client with source note, you can use a different client and source…, but it is probably best that you didn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: A question on source and clients

item.title: A question on source and clients
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

thanks all for answering but lets say for example in the moparscape 3.2 source all the files are .class and i cant edit anything bec. the .java files aren’t there what should i do? and lets say i wanted to edit the client’s looks like moparscape has a car lets say i wanted a balloon for example…

Read full topic
item.source: A question on source and clients

item.title: A question on source and clients
item.dc:creator: @ArticBlooms ArticBlooms
item.description:
@ArticBlooms wrote:

I’m pretty sure you can use some clients with some sources. I’m not 100% sure, but some clients are multi-use clients which can be used with many sources. But clients have different caches and if you use an older client with a newer source, some items may appear as nulls. So, I suggest you just use the client provided with the source.

Read full topic
item.source: A question on source and clients

item.title: A question on source and clients
item.dc:creator: @bestofpvm bestofpvm
item.description:
@bestofpvm wrote:

no you cannont use a different client with a different source because a client is specially associated with the source. That’s just my opinion. If you want an actual answer wait and see until another person posts/

Read full topic
